text: @TheRickWilson @kurtbardella This Administration uses this pandemic to benefit and enrich their cronies while the virus spreads and people die at an exponential rate. Acting only to help stockholders and corporations. Holding daily MIS-information briefings. Now this? Power and greed are their #1 priorities
